table.name: operational_location_d
table.description: Detail info for operational locations. Used as a lookup so that operational location may be automatically assigned.

columns.name: OPERATIONAL_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the operational location.

columns.name: SEQ_NO
columns.description: Sequence to allow multiple data records for the same operational location.

columns.name: PRIMARY_LEG_SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The service provider of the main leg which will help indicate which operational location applies.

columns.name: PRIMARY_LEG_LOC_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The location on the main leg which will help indicate which operational location applies; usually Port of Exit or Port of Discharge.

columns.name: INBOUND_OUTBOUND_TYPE
columns.description: Indicates whether this operational location for the mapping of the service provider and location profile is used for importing (I), exporting (E), or both (B).

columns.name: INCLUSION_REGION_GID
columns.description: If set, this operational location is applicable only when the opposite endpoint of the shipment is within the region.

columns.name: EXCLUSION_REGION_GID
columns.description: If set, this operational location is not applicable when the opposite endpoint of the shipment is within the region.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
